DOC.brief_summary: Duration exercise important factor among medical guide weight loss . However , still little knowledge model middle-aged old men . The present study aim determine effect interval train weight loss lipid profile , compare efficiency continuous training .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants include sedentary men ( age 45-75 year ) overweight obesity ( n= 82 ) . They randomly divide two group include continuous exercise , interval exercise . The weight assessment parameter include change weight body composition , blood sample test perform pre- three month post-intervention .
DOC.criteria: Sedentary lifestyle Good Health Weight stability Abnormality history Disease
